author_blurb.en: Translated for SuttaCentral by Bhikkhu Sujato, 2018. Dedicated to the public domain via Creative Commons Zero (CC0). You are encouraged to copy, reproduce, adapt, alter, or otherwise make use of this translation in any way you wish. Attribution is appreciated but not legally required.

segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 1
segments.en: Numbered Discourses 1

segments.pli: 31. Amatavagga
segments.en: 31. The Deathless

segments.pli: “Amataṃ te, bhikkhave, na paribhuñjanti ye kāyagatāsatiṃ na paribhuñjanti.
segments.en: “Mendicants, those who don’t enjoy mindfulness of the body don’t enjoy the deathless.

segments.pli: Amataṃ te, bhikkhave, paribhuñjanti ye kāyagatāsatiṃ paribhuñjantī”ti.
segments.en: Those who enjoy mindfulness of the body enjoy the deathless.”

segments.pli: “Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, aparibhuttaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati aparibhuttā.
segments.en: “Mendicants, those who haven’t enjoyed mindfulness of the body haven’t enjoyed the deathless.

segments.pli: Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, paribhuttaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati paribhuttā”ti.
segments.en: Those who have enjoyed mindfulness of the body have enjoyed the deathless.”

segments.pli: “Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, parihīnaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati parihīnā.
segments.en: “Mendicants, those who have lost mindfulness of the body have lost the deathless.

segments.pli: Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, aparihīnaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati aparihīnā”ti.
segments.en: Those who haven’t lost mindfulness of the body haven’t lost the deathless.”

segments.pli: “Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, viraddhaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati viraddhā.
segments.en: “Mendicants, those who have missed out on mindfulness of the body have missed out on the deathless.

segments.pli: Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, āraddhaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati āraddhā”ti.
segments.en: Those who have undertaken mindfulness of the body have not missed out on the deathless.”

segments.pli: “Amataṃ te, bhikkhave, pamādiṃsu ye kāyagatāsatiṃ pamādiṃsu.
segments.en: “Mendicants, those who have neglected mindfulness of the body have neglected the deathless.

segments.pli: Amataṃ te, bhikkhave, na pamādiṃsu ye kāyagatāsatiṃ na pamādiṃsu”.
segments.en: Those who have not neglected mindfulness of the body have not neglected the deathless.”

segments.pli: “Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, pamuṭṭhaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati pamuṭṭhā.
segments.en: “Mendicants, those who have forgotten mindfulness of the body have forgotten the deathless.

segments.pli: Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, appamuṭṭhaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati appamuṭṭhā”ti.
segments.en: Those who haven’t forgotten mindfulness of the body haven’t forgotten the deathless.”

segments.pli: “Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, anāsevitaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati anāsevitā.
segments.en: “Mendicants, those who haven’t cultivated mindfulness of the body haven’t cultivated the deathless.

segments.pli: Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, āsevitaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati āsevitā”ti.
segments.en: Those who have cultivated mindfulness of the body have cultivated the deathless.”

segments.pli: “Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, abhāvitaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati abhāvitā.
segments.en: “Mendicants, those who haven’t developed mindfulness of the body haven’t developed the deathless.

segments.pli: Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, bhāvitaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati bhāvitā”ti.
segments.en: Those who have developed mindfulness of the body have developed the deathless.”

segments.pli: “Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, abahulīkataṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati abahulīkatā.
segments.en: “Mendicants, those who haven’t practiced mindfulness of the body haven’t practiced the deathless.

segments.pli: Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, bahulīkataṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati bahulīkatā”ti.
segments.en: Those who have practiced mindfulness of the body have practiced the deathless.”

segments.pli: “Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, anabhiññātaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati anabhiññātā.
segments.en: “Mendicants, those who haven’t had insight into mindfulness of the body haven’t had insight into the deathless.

segments.pli: Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, abhiññātaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati abhiññātā”ti.
segments.en: Those who have had insight into mindfulness of the body have had insight into the deathless.”

segments.pli: “Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, apariññātaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati apariññātā.
segments.en: “Mendicants, those who haven’t completely understood mindfulness of the body haven’t completely understood the deathless.

segments.pli: Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, pariññātaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati pariññātā”ti.
segments.en: Those who have completely understood mindfulness of the body have completely understood the deathless.”

segments.pli: “Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, asacchikataṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati asacchikatā.
segments.en: “Mendicants, those who haven’t realized mindfulness of the body haven’t realized the deathless.

segments.pli: Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, sacchikataṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati sacchikatā”ti.
segments.en: Those who have realized mindfulness of the body have realized the deathless.”
The thousand discourses of the Ones are completed.

segments.pli: Idamavoca bhagavā.
segments.en: That is what the Buddha said.

segments.pli: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
segments.en: Satisfied, the mendicants were happy with what the Buddha said.

segments.pli: (Amatavaggo.)
Ekakanipātapāḷi niṭṭhitā.
segments.en: The Book of the Ones is finished.

sections.title: “Mendicants, those who don’t enjoy mindfulness of the body…
